Note that the ticket has been closed, meaning that there is no need for
another reply. If you are still needing help, then you must open a new
support ticket, or write in this ticket to reopen it. To do so, login to
the control panel at the following address:

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login, then go in the support ticket tab and type your reply.
You can also just hit reply with your email client, or write to:

%%%SUPPORT_EMAIL_ADDRESS%%%

which will also reopen the ticket.

If you are answering by email, please do not change the address of the
reply. The number that is included in this address is very important, and
helps to link your email to the old ticket! Also, please do not include our
reply in the body of your message, as we already keep a history of it.
